00036     public:
00037     typedef int Id;
00038 
00040 
00044     virtual bool push_back(X*) =0;

00054         MyInterests<X>*interests=0,

00059     virtual void  deleteQueue(Id) = 0;

00065 template<class X>
00066 class ConsumerQueueInterface {
00067     public:
00068     
00069     //MasterQueueInterface<X> * getMasterQueue();
00071     
00073     virtual void wait() = 0;
00074 
00075     virtual void lock(const char*why, const char*file, int line) = 0;
00078         virtual int size() = 0;
00079         virtual const X* first() = 0;
00080         virtual void discardFirst() = 0;
00081         void discardAll() { while(size()) discardFirst(); }
00082

00100     template<class Y> const Y* firstAs() {
00101         if(!size()) {
00102             queueNoNo("Warning, cannot firstAs if size is 0");
00103             return 0;
00104          }
00105         return dynamic_cast<const Y*>(first());
00106     }
00107     
00108     
00110     template<class Y>
00111     std::vector<Y> cloneContentL() {
00112         std::vector<Y> v;
00113         LOCK(this, "cloning content");
00114         v.reserve(size());
00115             while(size()) {
00116                 const Y * xp = firstAs<Y>();
00117                 if(xp) v.push_back(*xp);
00118                 discardFirst();
00119             }
00120         //q->dischargeSemaphore();
00121         unlock();
00122         return v;
00123     }
00124 #if 0
00125     template<class Y>
00126     std::vector<std::auto_ptr<Y> > cloneContentWithCopyConstructor() {
00127         std::vector<std::auto_ptr<Y> > v;
00128         LOCK(this, "cloning content");
00129         v.reserve(size());
00130             while(size()) {
00131                 const Y * xp = firstAs<Y>();
00132                 if(xp) {
00133                     Y * clone = new Y(xp); 
00134                     std::auto_ptr<Y> p(clone);
00135                     v.push_back(p);
00136                 }
00137                 discardFirst();
00138             }
00139         //q->dischargeSemaphore();
00140         unlock();
00141         return v;
00142     }
